rules_text:
Kicker {E}{E} [i](You may pay an additional {E}{E} as you cast this spell.)[/i]
When this creature enters, choose up to one target permanent card in your graveyard. If this spell was kicked, return it from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, put it on top of your library and get {E}{E}.
{T}: Untap target land.
